description: Update a project transport plan event time.
permissions: Allowed if the user can update the related project transport plan event via ProjectTransportPlanEventPolicy, or if the user is a member in the broker branch and is an active driver assigned to a segment connected to the event's stop.
side_effects: Updates the specified project transport plan event time. For expected or actual times, setting/changing time values marks the record as a manual override (is_manual_override true, is_app_owned false). After update, may close the tractor actualization window and may publish a transport order stop arrival event.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --kind, --start-at, --end-at, or --at must be provided. kind must be one of: planned, expected, actual, modeled. end_at must be greater than or equal to start_at when provided. kind must be unique per project transport plan event. For actual times, start_at/end_at cannot be earlier than actual times on earlier plan events with overlapping equipment.

flags.name: --at
flags.description: Legacy timestamp; sets start and end to the same value
